awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 9 wins & 19 nominations.

fullplot: After a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a clean cut high school girl sees her life paralleling Hester Prynne's in "The Scarlet Letter," which she is currently studying in school - until she decides to use the rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
plot: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
title: Easy A

tomatoes.consensus: It owes a huge debt to older (and better) teen comedies, but Easy A proves a smart, witty showcase for its irresistibly charming star, Emma Stone.
